Race.SpecificTitle: PW School District -- Local Option - Term Limits
Race.FullText:
"LOCAL OPTION ELECTION
Within Pointe Coupee Parish School District:
Shall the number of terms of office that any member of the school board may serve be limited to three consecutive four-year terms?"

Race.SpecificTitle: Town of Fordoche -- 7 Mills - TC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Town of Fordoche Proposition
(Tax Renewal)

Summary:  10 year, 7 mills property tax renewal within the Town of Fordoche for general municipal and local purposes.
Race.FullText: Shall the Town of Fordoche, in the Parish of Pointe Coupee, State of Louisiana, be authorized to continue to levy and collect an ad valorem tax of seven (7) mills on all property subject to taxation in said Town (an estimated $21,785.00 is reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2013 and ending with the year 2022, for general municipal and local purposes, strictly public in their nature?
